creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Create a new Test Plan
Create:
Test Plan
       |----Thread Group
                |- DebugSampler with name set to ${__TestPlanName}


Run it, DebugSampler will show null

Save it , reload it, it works
